title: Books Beyond Borders
main_description: Today’s SanMargam fundraiser will support the creation of a Rural Tech Hub in Madurai. This hub will be a space where students can access computers, learn coding and robotics, practice English, and explore new technologies. It’s about giving rural youth the tools to compete in a digital world, opening doors to opportunities that once felt far away.

goal.intro: Through Sahana Kumar, Sarika Rajan and Kirthana Warrier’s SanMargam Bharatanatyam Fundraiser, we aim to create a Rural Tech Hub in Perayur, Tamil Nadu. This center will give students access to:
goal.pilot_note: This pilot project will serve as a model for similar hubs in Maharashtra, Rajasthan, Odisha, and beyond.
